RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the border patrol checkpoint: border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the primary inspection lane: primary inspection lane at the border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the secondary inspection area: secondary inspection area at the border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the border checkpoint: border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: country making an appeal from orders suppressing evidence and responding to the appeal, seeking review of the district court's judgment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location where a federal grand jury returned an indictment and where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was stopped by a border patrol checkpoint, 15 miles south of which the checkpoint is located on I-35, birthplace of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.I-35: highway where the border patrol checkpoint is located, near Laredo, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: destination of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso's trip
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near La: checkpoint where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was initially stopped and questioned by Agent Jesus Garcia and where his detention was argued to be unconstitutionally lengthy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.primary inspection lane at the border pa: lane where Agent Jesus Garcia was manning when Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso pulled up
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.secondary inspection area at the border: area where a canine alerted and agents discovered cocaine hidden in the side panel of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso's car
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.District Court: court making decisions on appeals and subpoenas in the case, court that sensibly made findings on factual questions of guilt or innocence before ruling on motions to suppress, entered an order after a bench trial ended and the United States of America entered its guilty verdict, court whose judgment is under review
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.court of appeals: appellate court with jurisdiction over appeals from district courts, including the current appeal by the United States of America
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: trial court whose decision is under appeal by the United States of America
